Description:
Designer Living on Separate Title
In Room Auction - Wednesday 31st July @ 6.30pm
Ray White Croydon
71 Main Street, Croydon
A striking modern creation of distinctive style, quality and space, this designer home delivers exclusive contemporary living for families, professionals and downsizers all on it's own separate title with no shared or common land.
Quietly set back from the road on a block of only two, it showcases a flowing single-level layout of cleverly configured living, entertaining and accommodation, complemented by a crisp colour palette, clean lines and lashings of natural light. The distinctive weatherboard façade creates a lasting first impression and introduces the impressive interiors that begin with a sprawling open plan living zone.
Defined by polished timber floors, soaring ceilings and clerestory windows it provides an abundance of space to relax or entertain from and is overseen by the sleek gourmet kitchen that features stone benchtops, sociable breakfast bar and stainless-steel appliances including an electric oven, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Seamless indoor/outdoor flow is facilitated by sliding doors that retract to reveal a large covered deck. Enjoy entertaining outdoors whilst overlooking the leafy, low-maintenance garden.
Three generously-sized bedrooms include the master suite that comprises a walk-in robe and luxe ensuite with a floating vanity. An immaculate main bathroom with a bath, shower and separate WC service the remaining bedrooms. Further enhancements include ducted heating, split-system cooling, large laundry, plenty of storage, plumbed water tank and a spacious double garage with internal access.
Within close proximity to local shops, walk distance to transport and Mooroolbark Station, Barngeong Reserve, Croydon Main Street, Ruskin Park Primary School, Eastland and EastLink, the location offers exceptional connectivity to a range of amenities.

Superb blend of comfort and location.
Peacefully positioned within a picturesque park-like complex, this solid two-bedroom residence enjoys an admirable location, offering instant connection to amenities, as well as providing comfortable indoor and outdoor living areas, all on a generously sized allotment of 399m2 (approx.).

Love, Family and a Home.
This is so much more than a house, this is a loving home filled with childhood antics and crammed with a lifetime of memories and love.
Lets take a step back in time to the late 1950s when Kevin and his lovely wife Joy headed out to a little suburb on the outer fringes on Melbourne called Croydon.

They came with hopes and dreams of a bright future and a family home filled with the sounds of kids playing and the smells of the Sunday roast with the whole clan after morning church.
They found a block and built their home. Their eldest son was brought home from hospital soon after to their brand new, freshly built house. It was small to start with but so was their family. As they planned from the outset, they built a life and more children were welcomed home. As the family grew so did the house and today it stands as a four bedroom, two living area, two bathroom residence that also has a study or home office.
Over the years they watched their family grow as indeed the suburb of Croydon grew. The family of Mum, Dad and 5 kids went to school, played at the neighbours house and filled this home with the sort of love and memories that live on, long after the family have moved out.
Its time now to hand this off to the next custodians, time to fill this home with some more memories for a new family. This home has history and for the very first time in 62 years, you can own it. You can make it yours and enjoy the space, the access to the shops and the security of being on the service road. It's got a big back yard, a tandem garage, gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling and it has stood the test of time.
Call today and start your own journey and help continue this propertys legacy as a warm, loving family home, that is part of the foundation and history of Croydon.
